121  void get_parameters(plValues &params) const
122  {
123  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
124  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plBayesLearnNdNormalWithKnownVariance::get_parameters");
125 
126  const unsigned int dim = mean_.size();
127  const plFloatVector &mean = get_mu();
128 
129 
130  unsigned int index = 0;
131 
132  // mean
133  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < dim; ++i){
134  params[index++] = mean[i];
135  }
136 
137  // covariance
138  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < dim; ++i){
139  for(unsigned int j = 0; j < dim; ++j){
140  params[index++] = sigma0_[i][j];
141  }
142  }
143 
144  }
145 
146  unsigned int get_n_parameters()const
147  {
148  if(all_vars_.is_empty())
149  throw plError(75, "when calling 'plBayesLearnNdNormalWithKnownVariance::get_n_parameters");
150 
151  return mean_.size();
152  }
153

155  {
156  return new plBayesLearnNdNormalWithKnownVariance(*this);
157  }

164  virtual void Output(std::ostream &out) const;
165 protected:
168  bool internal_addPoint(const plDataValues &point, plFloat weight);
